import pandas as pd

df = pd.read_csv('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/LinkedEarth/Pyleoclim_util/master/example_data/soi_data.csv',skiprows=0, header=1)
df.head()

import json

# This code will run relative to the root of the repo, so we can load files
with open("exercises/bookquotes.json") as f:
    DATA = json.loads(f.read())

# Print the first record in the DATA
print(DATA[0])

# Assign the length of DATA to some_var
some_var = len(DATA)

def test():
    # Here we can either check objects created in the solution code, or the

    assert df.shape[0] == 828, "Are you loading the right dataframe? The shape does not match"
    __msg__.good("Well done!")
